SEARCH
Package edu.rpi.legup.controller

Class EditorElementController

java.lang.Object
edu.rpi.legup.controller.EditorElementController
All Implemented Interfaces:
ActionListener, EventListener
public class EditorElementController extends Object implements ActionListener
EditorElementController manages actions related to UI elements within the puzzle editor environment. It handles button presses, updates element selection, and manages visual states of buttons
